website_summaries.verdict: A quality balloon arch at a quality price point.
pros: Kit includes balloon tying tool, flexible arch strip, glue dots, and balloon clips
Arch strip can be formed into any shape, not just an arch
Kit sits at a low price point
Glue dots help keep balloons tightly together
cons: Holes in the arch strip do not come pre-punched

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and Product
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as described. The balloon arches turned out adorable, and it was easy to use. I only used the strips, but I will use the other stuff in future parties. Cheaper than Walmart or Party City + you get more stuff.
customer_reviews.author: APRIL PRYOR

customer_reviews.title: Ballon Arch Needed? Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this kit. The best part was the strip - we use it to make a huge balloon arch and it was SO simple. I didn’t ever get the knack of the easy-tie gadget (probably user error), but the strip and flower pieces made this purchase worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Fulvia Galli

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: The strip that the balloon go on was not durable. If you bent it too much by accident the tape would snap. Also had to punch out each hole as you went, which was very time consuming. I ended up using a needle and fishing wire and got a MUCH better result. Nothing on the packaging was in English and I couldn’t figure out how to use the pieces that help tie balloons. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Gosselin

customer_reviews.title: Holes aren't punched out
customer_reviews.text: I was very dissatisfied with this item. Purchased so I can make things easier when creating the balloon garland, instead I'm left to punch out all the holes where the balloon ends go. None were punched out from the roll I received, this is very tiring on your finger tips and unnecessary as we pay for these items to make things easier for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy, fun and amazing results
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and lots of fun even for the first-timers.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Difficult Decorating Strip
customer_reviews.text: The decorating strip is extremely hard to use - the holes are not punched through and the strip bends excessively trying to punch them out in order to insert the balloon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the end result of this item! I only needed one strip of the two it came with and I made the balloons different sizes to give it more of a personality and created an ombre look to go with the theme of her party. big hit and really was the talk of the party. used a Ryobi inflator to inflate each balloon and blew them up the day before.
customer_reviews.author: MelRose86

customer_reviews.title: Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I've made many balloon arches in the past and decided to try this to hopefully make life easier. I'm so glad I did! It was easy to put the balloons in the strip, and the end result came out terrific! I would definitely go this route again in the future if I need to make more arches.
customer_reviews.author: Mom Chasing Deals

customer_reviews.title: Open day before using to straighten
customer_reviews.text: It was so tightly curled for oacking I couldnt get it to straighten enough to use it. IF I I Opened BEFORE the day of party it would have prob been fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca massey

customer_reviews.title: made my work easier
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for a balloon garland. I used the garland tape and the glue dots. I did not use the items to make flowers, but the garland tape and glue dots were very easy to use. I inserted 2 balloons into each hole and skipped every other hole. I don't think I could make balloon garland without the tape! We also used the blue things to help tie the balloons. It helped do everything quicker and easier than if we didn't have these items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So neat!
customer_reviews.text: I am still in awe of this decorating strip kit! The results were so amazing looking and two weeks later are still up on our windows! We used a balloon buddy (highly recommend getting one) and then put the balloons in alternating colors. Super easy. We tied thin ribbons to each end and hung the ribbon with thumb tacks. Guests loved them and couldn’t believe we did them ourselves! 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Lorynn

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Return Policy
customer_reviews.text: Beware when buying that they will charge you to return this item back if not satisfied,
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Peacock

customer_reviews.title: Great tools to make beautiful and easy balloon garland!
customer_reviews.text: Busted out this balloon garland last minute and using the balloon strip was SO easy!! Literally took me an hour to make a decently long garland using the balloon tape. Party guests were shocked I made it myself!! The balloon knotting tool was so helpful and sped things up big time! Didn’t use the glue dots but if I had more time I could see how they would be perfect to fill in areas and keep balloons together. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Adams Family

customer_reviews.title: overpriced Chinese junk
customer_reviews.text: The flower makers were useful but if you weren’t careful they would slice the balloons. The strip for the balloon arch was so brittle it broke repeatedly. I have no idea what those blue things were for and there were no instructions in box or listing. And my husband said the dots were useless. Not sure why.
customer_reviews.author: euromegan

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need for balloon decorations!
customer_reviews.text: This came with so much stuff I was able to use it for two separate birthday parties! Making balloon arches is kind of time consuming, but it is the cheapest party decoration and you can do a lot with them. I used this kit for a balloon arch, center pieces, and pillar decorations. I would totally recommend a balloon pump unless you're into extreme lung exercise. I love the little water glue dots it comes with too, those are great for sticking balloons (or any light decoration) to walls or something else.
customer_reviews.author: LizOnTheCheap

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste anytime just buy it already!!
customer_reviews.text: Just purchase it you won’t be disappointed I love this kit it came as pictured and has made every party such a breeze with the balloon tier and the glue Dots as well as the decorating strip you cannot go wrong...I have no complaints as a mother of 4 with so many birthdays including my husbands and other major events anniversary mothers day fathers and holidays I’m always planning and decorating so this kit I am so greatful for... it made my sons birthday party balloon garland in May such a breeze coming in just a few days I’ll be using it again for me and my husbands anniversary party then Father’s Day!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Stpierre

customer_reviews.title: great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: loved using this item to decorate for my little ones birthday. easy to use and put together.
customer_reviews.author: Jesika DeMatteo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value for set
customer_reviews.text: I had bought another balloon arch kit that didn’t come with the balloon tying tool and I regretted it after tying a few balloons with just my fingers. Came across this set and just had to get it bc it’s a great price for the items given. I can use the extra rolls to extend my other arch if needed. And the tying tool is a finger saver!!! So easy to use. I highly recommend getting this if you are tying a large quantity of balloons. Your fingers will thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Balloon Decorating Made Easy
customer_reviews.text: This was the greatest!! We made a beautiful arch with one strip and used the flower holders to attach about 8 holes apart. Attached 3-4 balloons per plastic flower holder. We tied it to the side of our EZ up tent with strip ties. You will need to buy strip ties separately but that’s the only extra that helps keep this attached. Once it’s used, you can pop the balloons and use the strip and flower holders again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: Must have for every bday
customer_reviews.text: My niece used this item to make the balloon arch and she said it was so easy to use, i have friends that will be ordering from you soon for their kids bday parties, we used the flower template too so easy to use i would recommend dont throw out flower template because you can use it again. The glue dots omg my favorite i used them on the balloons and to glue large confetti on a sequin runner and it did not ruin the runner.
customer_reviews.author: Monica De Los Santos

customer_reviews.title: Open and missing 75% of product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bag was already open or used , it’s was missing all the products except for the flower clips .... I was having a going away party for our daughter who is in the army and couldn’t do the balloon garland or blow that many up with out the towing tools or glue dots or arch strip ..... the only thing that saved me was a arch strip that came in a pack of balloons I bought ..... now I have to take my time n gas money to return basically an empty package .... I also wasn’t given the choice for a replacement only a refund
customer_reviews.author: Fallon scott

customer_reviews.title: Be aware so you can be prepared
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t made the balloon garland yet but I’m so glad I noticed the balloon holes weren’t punched out. This took some time and would have made a mess if I hadn’t removed them before assembling the garland. I gave 3 stars because, like I said, I haven’t used it yet and I couldn’t submit this review without doing so. Hopefully after I use this I’ll be able to give glowing reviews🤞
customer_reviews.author: Julie M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Making Clusters of Balloon "Clouds"
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make "clouds" out of balloons and it worked great! The same process as the garland, but I used shorter strips and at the ends of each cloud tapered off the shape a bit. I hung about six at different heights and people knew exactly what they were supposed to be. The process to create them was super simple.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Missing the garland strip!
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding me? I ordered this primarily for the garland strip and it arrived missing that piece! Such a let-down. I need it this weekend so I’m not just inconvenienced by having to ship it back to get a refund, I’m ticked. Hopefully I can find another in time. 😓
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Plastic is flimsy PLUS I had to spend time to actually punch each and every hole out in order for the balloons to go in the holes. Will NOT be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR EVENTS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This transformed my toddlers birthday party!! We did a balloon arch and it took about 10 minutes for us to attach blown up balloons to the arch. There are so many different pieces we will be able to use it for multiple birthdays and events! I definitely recommend if you want to up your ballon game for a party :-) I wish I would have ordered this years ago
customer_reviews.author: Jordan B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was able to make such a cute balloon garland for my son's birthday. This is my first time ever doing this and it was so simple to do. The glue dots the kit comes with do not hold a lot of weight, I found they hold 1 balloon with 1-3 dots. Additionally, the centerpiece makers make such cute and easy centerpieces with just a few balloons.
customer_reviews.author: Kasondra Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Made life easier lol
customer_reviews.text: Okay if I wouldn't have bought this my round balloon stand would've been difficult to make! I used the flower balloon tools that holds 5 balloons and tied them around the stand then where ever there was empty spots I used the glue dots to add more balloon! Very happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Grecia

customer_reviews.title: A must for decorating
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. I love the double stick circles which I used to attach balloons with no helium to the ceiling - turned out great. And the balloon flower strip was great as well. Love the fact that it comes with a ton of stuff ... so you can get quite a few uses out of this kit. Highly recommened.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Loved the sad love the little sticky tape that you use to stick the balloons on the wall or to each other the blue things you used to tie the balloons are a little hard to use at first but once you get the hang of it, they work way better than using your hands And you can make beautiful flowers with your balloons
customer_reviews.author: billycat

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this specifically for the balloon tape, the other items were just “extra” in my book. Received the item today and it was missing the two rolls of balloon tape! The whole reason I bought it! Now I need to purchase balloon tape, again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great kit, I ran out of time to actually make the bouquet look like how I wanted but the strip was easy to use and saved some time. Wasn’t sure how to use the balloon knot device, I have acrylic nails so it helped me not break my nails but slow to use.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it’s supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Does what you need it to. Not sure there’s much else to say about it! Balloon tying things worked great, balloon tape held a great amount of balloons & the glue dots held on extra balloons fine. Sometime you need an extra glue dot or two but not a big deal. Didn’t use the flower templates so can’t speak for those!
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Padgett

customer_reviews.title: Makes a super cute arch
customer_reviews.text: I have not used the flower things or the stickies but I have made two arches from the same strip and saved it to do another arch in the future. The assembly is extremely easy (and you don't need the sticky dots for it) and will buy again in the future if I need to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: K.M.K.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but did the job for the day
customer_reviews.text: It took me about 2 hours to make. I blew the balloons and had my daughter stick then in the holes. As we got down the line, the holes were starting to get closer to the edge until half of them were off the strip so I had to cut that piece off and continue where the holes were lined up in the middle. That sucked!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh, it was so-so for me.
customer_reviews.text: The balloon tying pieces are too large for small hands to work with. The strips were harder to deal with. I preferred using fishing line. The plastic pieces that allowed you to add several pieces at one time were FABULOUS!!!
customer_reviews.author: KjLg

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Great products!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make the balloon arch. In addition to the arches, it comes with adhesive to stick balloons to walls (which doesn’t damage the surfaces), and plastic tools to tie balloons. Great value and great products!
customer_reviews.author: LVKIM

customer_reviews.title: Balloon Arch
customer_reviews.text: The items are as pictured; I gave it 4 stars because the balloon tape strips are not ready to use. You have to take out the plastic pieces in the center which is super annoying and time consuming.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Cox

customer_reviews.title: Good products for balloon garland
customer_reviews.text: These products were very helpful when making my balloon garland for my daughter’s baby shower. The only thing I disliked is the balloon garland slots had pieces that you had to punch out, which was very easy, however that means they end up everywhere in your workspace.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica House

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: - the holes are not punched through and when you try to punched them out the strip snaps and the strip bends. The dot tape don’t work. Horrible product it ruins my decorations no to add the frustration
customer_reviews.author: selene coria

customer_reviews.title: nice kit
customer_reviews.text: The arch strip and the glue dots are excellent tools for creating a awesome balloon structures for whatever occasion. The balloon tying device wasn't ery helpful for me personally.
customer_reviews.author: Moonspinklady06

customer_reviews.title: Just buy garland tape
customer_reviews.text: The garland tape worked but the tying tools are very difficult to get use to. Easier to tie the balloons by hand. Glue dots are very cheap, their stick doesn’t last. The flower tools weren’t used. Skip this pack and just buy the garland tape if your making just a garland.
customer_reviews.author: NJHouck

customer_reviews.title: Made decorating a breeze
customer_reviews.text: The dots were FANTASTIC to hold up balloons. The strip made the best balloon wall hanging ever! Super easy to create. Buy buy buy if you have decorations to put up. A+++++
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: THE CHEAPEST EASIEST AND BEST !!
customer_reviews.text: I jad to make a ballon garland for the first time for my daughter's party and that Ballon garland strip was PERFECT!!! PEOPLE LOVED IT! You would think it was a done my a professional.
customer_reviews.author: Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Lots of pieces, I didn’t love the fower shapes once we got the balloons in them but that’s just personal preference. Was very helpful to have for party setup
customer_reviews.author: Kat B.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal they turned out beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These really are value for the money they were such a good deal and they work so amazing I wish I could have gotten pictures they turn out very beautifully follow instructions
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Stop reading reviews and just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing I've bought on Amazon ever! Was amazingly easy to make a balloon arch for a school dance. Everything you need...and stuff you never knew you needed! PLUS a great price! (Oops...get an electric balloon pump too and ur set!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Or piece was damaged.
customer_reviews.text: One of the plastic connection pieces arrived damaged. Noticed too late to order a replacement since I assembled most of the connections already. Would still recommend since the price was cheap. Giving 3 stars since this upset the number to balance the arch I’m making and I have not tested the glue pieces yet.
customer_reviews.author: Philip K Schaaf

customer_reviews.title: Great Balloon Accessory
customer_reviews.text: This product made decorating for my birthday event so much easier! Definitely worth the money. The balloon decorations were a hit and looked like a party planner made them.
customer_reviews.author: CIP

customer_reviews.title: Easy for 1st time user
customer_reviews.text: Used the strip to make a balloon garland for the first time. Easy to use and durable! I don’t think the balloon tier is very practical though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Professional look without the price
customer_reviews.text: I will always use this from now in! I cant believe I went this long and didn't know this balloon Garland was a thing. Its deffo. Changed the balloon game forever. I live this kit and will reorder this EVERY time I have a party.
customer_reviews.author: Landon Hall

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: It hold more balloons than you think! I only used 1 garland and 1 roll of balloon glue (I'm in love with balloon glue now) for this display and about 100 balloons. I recommend more balloons and a balloon inflator!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Brown

customer_reviews.title: Quicker set up!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Comes with everything you need to build a balloon kit. I am able to set up so much in half the time. I am so happy with this purchase. Cons: does not come with balloons
customer_reviews.author: Mags

customer_reviews.title: Easy DIY balloon Arch
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit to easily make your own arch. It includes everything you need, and the “tape” part is definitely reuseable if you take the time to remove all of the balloons.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great design tool for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I purchased for the strip... it helped my inexperienced employees make balloons garlandd.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cool!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the strip where you put the balloon. An FYI but command strips and use those on the wall to make the arch. The glue dots were bad and didn’t work well at all. But the arch looked awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Offenberger

customer_reviews.title: Easy squeezy
customer_reviews.text: Had no idea how to make a balloon arch after buying this kit it was a breeze!! Easiest set up! So worth it! I popped all the balloons after and just pulled them out so I can re use the strip it’s very durable I couldn’t just toss it! Using it again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Urreoa

customer_reviews.title: Half of this is good
customer_reviews.text: The string for garland was great but the stickers did not hold well and it was more complicated to use the blue pieces that help u tie them than to just tie them with your fingers. Also didn’t mind the flower pieces but they are not meant for 12” balloons... def need to do smaller balloons to use those
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Fry

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: SAVE YOUR MONEY. When I received this package , it was opened and had everything missing minus the balloon flower clips. I’m upset because I Literally only ordered this because I wanted the balloon ties but thought it would be kind of cool to have the other things included. Do better please !
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Rice

customer_reviews.title: A must for balloons!
customer_reviews.text: If you are having balloons for anything, this is a must! These balloons are spaced ever other spot on the balloon strip. One strip was used, package comes with two. Was so easy to use, my 9 year old niece put this all together herself.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie L

customer_reviews.title: Tie Tool
customer_reviews.text: Instructions for the tool used to tie the balloons wasn't in the kit and we could not use it. One of the main reasons for buying the kit was for the tool. The tape was a wonderful thing to use and did what it was supposed to do. We made a few flowers with the flower disk that turned out cute. The two arches we made with the tape turned out stunning and very full.
customer_reviews.author: kathy abdelhak

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: The ballon knot assistant device works great. Very easy to tie a knot and saves the wear and tear on your fingers. The tape for the ballon Garland works ok, you just have to make sure theres two balloons in each hole so they dont come off.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Amador

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: At first I was kind of confused on how to assemble the flowers, but that was only becaus ei didnt read the instructions. Very easy to use, the glue dots are very sticky and hold the balloons in place very good.
customer_reviews.author: Adilene Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: This balloon tying kit saved my fingers. Was blowing up 120 balloons for a baby shower. Highly recommend. Will use the flower discs included with the kit for girl baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best kit ever!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect and made the process of putting this balloon arch together so easy. It turned out beautifully and we had so many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Kourtney S.

customer_reviews.title: Meh!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t really like this kit. I gave it 2 stars because of the variety but I could have really done without it. The dots were not sticky enough and the flower thing was quite awkward to use. I didn’t use the knot thing. The strip was okay for the balloon arch but I could have achieved a better arch with ribbon.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Umeh

customer_reviews.title: Makes Balloon Decorating Easy
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't come with instructions (had to reference images here). But after that it took only a few minutes to put the balloon decorations together. Would recommend using the scotch tab hangers to hang the plastic strips.
customer_reviews.author: Heather3

customer_reviews.title: BEST THING EVER
customer_reviews.text: If I took more time with it, it’d make an even cooler balloon arch. It was the easiest thing ever to assemble, without it, I couldn’t have even had anything close to this.
customer_reviews.author: Momma702

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to make an easy fast ballon arch!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to make a beautiful ballon arch! So easy to make and it’s has enough to make several ballon arts!!! We made a ballon arch in less then hour after all balloons were inflated.
customer_reviews.author: Brokk Nyswonger

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Worked out super well. I purchased the balloons off amazon as well. It all came together super nice. Took two people about two hours to put the balloon garland together.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: was really impressed with the timely matter my order was shipped out and received - good buy for money spent
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Z.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed to make the perfect vow renewal back drop
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my in laws vow renewal. Going to make ballon arches for more parties to come.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dean

customer_reviews.title: Have string to tie the garland
customer_reviews.text: I wish this kit came with string to tie the garland to the backdrop. But it came out perfect
customer_reviews.author: LaKeah Parker

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t purchase again
customer_reviews.text: No instructions & we didn’t know how to use properly making it difficult
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work to good
customer_reviews.text: Great concept but balloons pop off, if they are to big or to close to another one.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Tapia

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price all materials came in and where easy to use
customer_reviews.author: RMurdock

customer_reviews.title: Balloon kit
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery- nice products - would be better if some instructions included but can go back to selling ad to see. The balloon tie device works very well!
customer_reviews.author: soundmb

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: This made making a balloon garland very easy. It wasn't complicated to figure out and it came with a lot of different things in the kit. I only used the strips and the glue dots so I really can't comment on the other items included but I am very happy with my purchase and I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: It was super easy to make an arch with this. Making the flower was a bit difficult and didn't come out right. The dot-tapes were very handy. I loved everything.
customer_reviews.author: Snoopy

customer_reviews.title: Must have balloon tools!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use for my daughter’s birthday. I had 100 balloons to blow up. The ballon tying tool was invaluable and saved my fingers from the pain of tying all of the balloons. The other “tools” were great for creating balloon decorations. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Lippard

customer_reviews.title: Everybody needs this kit!
customer_reviews.text: All products in kit were very easy to use. Got on the first try.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa

customer_reviews.title: Balloons fall out of the plastic ribbon
customer_reviews.text: Balloons fall out of the plastic ribbon at times but overall great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Maria Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Great attachment set
customer_reviews.text: Used it to attach the balloons and happy birthday sign
customer_reviews.author: Traveller

customer_reviews.title: Need clear instructions
customer_reviews.text: I wish it came with a paper on how to use items, the bag has instructions but not clear at all
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Villalobos

customer_reviews.title: Glue dots sucks but everything else great
customer_reviews.text: Everything came and looks exactly like what was describe... I don't like the glue dots.. When i take them off the roll up.. Really sticky and cannot use them.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Really very easy to use and create a garland. I had never done one before but this made it easy. The garland lasted almost a week.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Showstopper
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my kids birthdays. Really great product. No instructions so it took me a while to figure it out but great for table decor. Perfect since there is a helium shortage.
customer_reviews.author: Cami

customer_reviews.title: One Pissed Mama Bear
customer_reviews.text: Extremely upset!!!! I have the flu and couldn’t pick up my order. I went to get pickup and it stated that they were picked up the day!!!!!! My daughters 16th birthday is in 3day. I need the purchase and now I don’t have it!!! They could have at least reached out to me first before returning them!!!! Could not be more upset!!!! One Pissed Mama Bear
customer_reviews.author: SandiKay Barber-Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Best DIY Garland kit!
customer_reviews.text: This made making a Garland easy least. It is still a tedious process but this was easy to use. Watch the how to video for tips.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect balloon kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit was soooo easy. I LOVED the results. :)
customer_reviews.author: Christina Dodd

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: It worked as advertised. The balloon arch I made for my son’s birthday party looks like it was done by a pro. People at the party were amazed too. Looks like I’m able to use the same strip on the future for a lot more times. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: Buy this it’s worth the money and save time!
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit, easy to use and saved me lots of time. I bought it to decorate for my father in-laws birthday party, everything came out excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: 1st time user & I must say it worked like a charm in doing the balloon arch for a friend's baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: Nia

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: The balloon tier doesn’t work. It’s easier to tie with your fingers than figuring that thing out. The plastic balloon holder doesn’t secure the balloons in. The balloons came out of my arch with the wind so I had to use string to secure them better
customer_reviews.author: gloria

customer_reviews.title: Super easy.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to make the arch. I used a little under 100 balloons to make the arch. I didn’t know how to use the balloon tier thing.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my daughter's second birthday party and worked exactly as expected!
customer_reviews.author: JWhite

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This was a great set. Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Jericca

customer_reviews.title: Ballon parts
customer_reviews.text: I had issues using the blue finger tie...I'm a leftie and it wasn't easy for me. The glue dots were a hit....
customer_reviews.author: Angelia Whatley

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Nice but I felt bit costly and strip will works well but flower making kit is bit difficult

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Worth it for garland or holding ballons together in stylish way!

product_meta.title: Coogam Balloon Decorating Strip Kit for Arch Garland 32Ft Balloon Tape Strip, 2 Pcs Tying Tool, 200 Dot Glue, 20 Ballon Flower Clip for Party Wedding Birthday Xmas Baby Shower DIY (Upgraded Version)
feature_bullets: ★DECENT PACKAGING: Coogam Balloon Decorating Strip Set comes with 2x balloon tape strip(16ft/Pcs with 110 holes), 2x tie tools, 2x glue craft point(100/pcs) and 20x convenient holder clips. Meet all your needs here!

★ATTENTION: Holes on strip are much easier to be punched through as being UPGRADED VERSION. Absolutely save your time. The glue dot will not work if use any tools or finger touch, but to press the object on the glue point directly.

★USER-FRIENDLY: Balloon tie tool helps tying balloons easy, faster and painless on finger. Insert balloons into the holes on the tape or put into grooves on clips. It will not fall out with a set of holes. Simply peel button off adhesive sheet and stick on the aim. Perfect to make flying balloons on clean ceiling/walls with these glue points. Very sticky and adhere well, also can be removed of no trace with careful handling. Super easy breezy putting balloon column together.

★GORGEOUS LOOK: The balloon decorating strip kit can be used to connected various sizes of latex balloons, which can make different types of balloon arches and garland, bring you a variety of beautiful graphic styles as a shock.

★MULTIFUNCTION: Great for party, wedding, birthday, baby shower, graduation, Christmas, anniversary and any special celebration activity. Take few time to decorate the party at home or anywhere you want, come to organize an unforgettable party!
